name: Verify POST request with valid URL and null data fields

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User sets request for Program module with valid base URL and NULL value in programStatus field
When  User sends POST request with Null values in programStatus field in request body from "ProgramPOSTValidData" and 0
Then  User gets Internal Server Error message with status code "500": Null Values
